mapper.update:
UPDATE le_user SET
le_user.userpassword = #{userpassword}, le_user.expirestime = date_add(now(),interval 1 MONTH),
le_user.nickname = #{nickname},
le_user.telphone = #{telphone},
le_user.email = #{email},
le_user.updatetime = now() WHERE le_user.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT userpassword from le_user where account = #{loginname} and status=1
select t.*, t1.roleid from le_user t left join le_roleuser t1 on t.id = t1.userid and t1.status=1 where t.account = #{loginname} and t.status=1

select le_user.*, (select le_roleuser.roleid from le_roleuser where le_roleuser.status=1 and le_roleuser.userid = le_user.id LIMIT 0,1) as roleid, (select le_rolemanagement.rolename from le_rolemanagement where le_rolemanagement.status=1 and le_rolemanagement.id = roleid LIMIT 0,1) as rolename, (select le_rolemanagement.roletype from le_rolemanagement where le_rolemanagement.status=1 and le_rolemanagement.id = roleid LIMIT 0,1) as roletype, (select pub_dictionary.text from pub_dictionary where pub_dictionary.status=1 and pub_dictionary.type='角色类型' and pub_dictionary.value= roletype) as roletypecaption from le_user where le_user.id = #{id} and le_user.status = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE le_user SET le_user.status = 2, le_user.updatetime = now() WHERE le_user.id = #{id}

le_rolefunction t1, le_user t2, le_roleuser t3,
le_functionmanagement t4, le_applicationmodule t5, le_menu t6 WHERE
t2.account = #{account} and t3.roleid = t1.roleid AND t2.id = t3.userid AND t1.dynamicId = t4.id AND t1.status = 1 AND t2.status = 1 AND t3.status = 1 AND
t4.applicationid = t5.id AND t6.functionid = t4.id AND t4.status = 1 AND t5.status = 1 AND t6.status = 1 UNION SELECT NULL, NULL, t7.menuname, t7.cssclass, t7.level, t7.sequence, t7.parentid, t7.id FROM le_menu t7 WHERE t7.id IN ( SELECT t6.parentid FROM
le_rolefunction t1, le_user t2, le_roleuser t3,
le_functionmanagement t4, le_applicationmodule t5, le_menu t6 WHERE
t2.account = #{account} and t3.roleid = t1.roleid AND t2.id = t3.userid AND t1.dynamicId = t4.id AND t1.status = 1 AND t2.status = 1 AND t3.status = 1 AND
t4.applicationid = t5.id AND t6.functionid = t4.id AND t4.status = 1 AND t5.status = 1 AND t6.status = 1 ) AND t7.status = 1 ORDER BY level, sequence
